refnamediv.refpurpose: Get interpreted size from ini shorthand syntax

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
shorthand
Ini shorthand to parse, must be a number followed by an optional multiplier.
The following multipliers are supported: k/K (1024), m/M (1048576), g/G (1073741824).
The number can be a decimal, hex (prefixed with 0x or 0X), octal (prefixed with 0o, 0O or 0) or binary (prefixed with 0b or 0B)

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the interpreted size in bytes as an &integer;.

&reftitle.errors;
If the value cannot be parsed, or an invalid multiplier is used, an E_WARNING is raised.
